WorkflowInfo.Name: Monitor log files
WorkflowInfo.Description: Monitor log files on list of servers
WorkflowInfo.Xoml:
<SequentialWorkflowActivity x:Name="CustomWorkflow" xmlns:ns0="clr-namespace:CreateMemoryTable;Assembly=CreateMemoryTable, Version=1.3.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns1="clr-namespace:GetRowsCount;Assembly=GetRowsCount, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns2="clr-namespace:ExitWhile;Assembly=ExitWhile, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns3="clr-namespace:GetCellValue;Assembly=GetCellValue, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns4="clr-namespace:ReadContinuousFile;Assembly=ReadContinuousFile, Version=1.1.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns5="clr-namespace:ReturnValue;Assembly=ReturnValue, Version=1.2.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns6="clr-namespace:GetRows;Assembly=GetRows, Version=1.2.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns7="clr-namespace:ConvertToHTMLTable;Assembly=ConvertToHTMLTable, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns8="clr-namespace:SendEmail;Assembly=SendEmail, Version=1.2.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns9="clr-namespace:Continue;Assembly=Continue, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/workflow" x:Class="WorkflowDesignerControl.CustomWorkflow"> <ns0:CreateMemoryTable IsValid="True" x:Name="createMemoryTable1" ColumnNumber="2" TableName="ServersList" RowNumber="3" isEmptyGrid="0" Description="Creates a memory table." DisplayName="Create Memory Table" TypeName="CreateMemoryTable" TableAsString="<NewDataSet>
 <xs:schema id="NewDataSet" xmlns="" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:msdata="urn:schemas-microsoft-com:xml-msdata">
 <xs:element name="NewDataSet" msdata:IsDataSet="true" msdata:MainDataTable="resultSet" msdata:UseCurrentLocale="true">
 <xs:complexType>
 <xs:choice minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded">
 <xs:element name="resultSet">
 <xs:complexType>
 <xs:sequence>
 <xs:element name="Server_x0020_Name" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" />
 <xs:element name="Log_x0020_Path" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" />
 </xs:sequence>
 </xs:complexType>
 </xs:element>
 </xs:choice>
 </xs:complexType>
 </xs:element>
 </xs:schema>
 <resultSet>
 <Server_x0020_Name>server1</Server_x0020_Name>
 <Log_x0020_Path>c:\logs\log.txt</Log_x0020_Path>
 </resultSet>
 <resultSet>
 <Server_x0020_Name>server2</Server_x0020_Name>
 <Log_x0020_Path>d:\log.txt</Log_x0020_Path>
 </resultSet>
 <resultSet>
 <Server_x0020_Name>192.168.1.10</Server_x0020_Name>
 <Log_x0020_Path>e:\AppLog.txt</Log_x0020_Path>
 </resultSet>
</NewDataSet>" /> <ns1:GetRowsCount IsValid="True" x:Name="getRowsCount1" ResultSet="%ServersList%" ResultSetName="ServersList" Description="Gets the amount of rows in a resultset." DisplayName="Get Rows Count" TypeName="GetRowsCount" /> <WhileActivity x:Name="whileActivity1" Condition="{x:Null}"> <SequenceActivity x:Name="sequenceActivity1"> <ns2:ExitWhile DisplayName="Exit While" x:Name="exitWhile1" Description="Exit current while activity" IsValid="True" TypeName="ExitWhile" Counter="%getRowsCount1%" /> <ns3:GetCellValue IsValid="True" x:Name="ServerName" ColumnNumber="1" ResultSet="%ServersList%" RowNumber="%exitWhile1%" ResultSetName="ServersList" Description="Gets a specific cell value from a resultset." DisplayName="Get Cell Value" TypeName="GetCellValue" /> <ns3:GetCellValue IsValid="True" x:Name="LogPath" ColumnNumber="2" ResultSet="%ServersList%" RowNumber="%exitWhile1%" ResultSetName="ServersList" Description="Gets a specific cell value from a resultset." DisplayName="Get Cell Value" TypeName="GetCellValue" /> <ns4:ReadContinuousFile IsValid="True" x:Name="readContinuousFile1" HostName="%ServerName%" TimeInSeconds="0" Timeout="00:01:00" DisplayName="Continuous File Reading" Path="%LogPath%" Password="" Description="Read file continuously" HostId="-2" TypeName="ReadContinuousFile" UserName="" /> <IfElseActivity x:Name="ifElseActivity1"> <IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="ifElseBranchActivity1"> <ns5:ReturnValue Value="failure" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue1" ConditionName="" UseBranchWhenTimeout="False" UseStoredValue="False" ConditionType="Contains" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=Contains("&&&","failure")" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="UserDefinedValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /> <ns6:GetRows RowNumber="" x:Name="getRows1" HostName="{x:Null}" RowContains="failure" ResultSet="%readContinuousFile1%" Timeout="00:01:00" IsValid="True" isRowNumber="1" DisplayName="Get Rows" ResultSetName="readContinuousFile1" TimeInSeconds="0" Description="Gets specified rows from a resultset." HostId="0" TypeName="GetRows" /> <ns7:ConvertToHTMLTable DisplayName="Convert to HTML Table" x:Name="convertToHTMLTable1" TypeName="ConvertToHTMLTable" Description="Convert a ResultSet to an HTML table." IsValid="True" Value="%getRows1%" /> <ns8:SendEmail Channel="0" TimeInSeconds="0" Subject="Failure Report on server %ServerName% Log Path %LogPath%" DestinationNumber="1" TemplateNumber="0" ShiftLevel="" IsValid="True" HostId="-2" TemplateName="" TypeName="SendEmail" SendRN="False" x:Name="sendEmail1" DestinationTypeCc="User" DestinationType="User" HostName="{x:Null}" Timeout="00:00:00" DisplayName="Send Email" Attachments="" Cc="" Description="Send an email to a user, a group or a duty." Continue="False" DestinationNumberCc="0" Body="<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.0 Transitional//EN">
<HTML><HEAD>
<META content="text/html; charset=unicode" http-equiv=Content-Type>
<META name=GENERATOR content="MSHTML 8.00.7601.17744"></HEAD>
<BODY style="BACKGROUND-COLOR: white">%convertToHTMLTable1%</BODY></HTML>
" To="Admin" ShiftLevelCc="" MessageType="Custom" /> </IfElseBranchActivity> <IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="ifElseBranchActivity2"> <ns5:ReturnValue Value="failure" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue2" ConditionName="" UseBranchWhenTimeout="True" UseStoredValue="False" ConditionType="Not Contains" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=Not Contains("&&&","failure")" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity."
